channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scientists Just Found a Link Between This Popular Food and Lung Cancer

item.description: More beachgoers have been getting an unexpected shock this summer as jellyfish numbers bloom along the Delaware coast

item.title: WhatsApp takes down 6.8 million accounts linked to criminal scam centers, Meta says
item.description: WhatsApp has taken down 6.8 million accounts linked to criminal scam centers worldwide, according to its parent company, Meta

item.title: Trump to put additional 25% import taxes on India, bringing combined tariffs to 50%
item.description: Trump has signed an executive order to place an additional 25% tariff on India for its purchases of Russian oil

item.title: New study sheds light on ChatGPT's alarming interactions with teens
item.description: New research from a watchdog group reveals ChatGPT can provide harmful advice to teens
